name: hello-world-cdn
description: An example vanilla that uses cjs modules that works with Honeycomb's OpenTelemetry Web Distro

scripts.build: cd $npm_config_local_prefix/../../ && npm run build && cd $npm_config_local_prefix &&  mkdir -p ./dist/umd/ && cp -vR $npm_config_local_prefix/../../dist/umd/index.js ./dist/umd
